name: Mac App Store Partially Downloaded App
summary: Learn about .APPDOWNLOAD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: When the download is complete, the ".appdownload" file extension is removed from the downloaded application in the /​Applications/​ directory.

description: An APPDOWNLOAD file is a file created by App Store, a program included with Mac OS X 10.6.6 or later that allows users to purchase macOS (OS X) software. It saves the contents of a purchased .APP file as it's being downloaded from the store.
